paragraphs.content: Chapter 6
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 6

paragraphs.content: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.

paragraphs.content: Bear ye one another’s burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Bear ye one another’s burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.

paragraphs.content: For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.

paragraphs.content: But let every man prove his own work, and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But let every man prove his own work, and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.

paragraphs.content: For every man shall bear his own burden.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For every man shall bear his own burden.

paragraphs.content: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.

paragraphs.content: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.

paragraphs.content: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.

paragraphs.content: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

paragraphs.content: As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.

paragraphs.content: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand.

paragraphs.content: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh, they constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh, they constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.

paragraphs.content: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.

paragraphs.content: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.

paragraphs.content: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.

paragraphs.content: And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.

paragraphs.content: From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.
paragraphs.contentHtml: From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.

paragraphs.content: Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Unto the Galatians written from Rome.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Unto the Galatians written from Rome.
